venue.name: Scituate Beach Association Ball Field Corner of Otis Rd and Turner Rd

item.description:
Join us for the 3rd Annual Scituate Beach Association 5K Road Race/Walk.
I have posted this event time for 8:30am and I will meet people at the event then, although the walk and run starts at different times.

I have also listed the event fee at the max amount of $30. Please see below:

Time:
Race day check in begins at 7:00 AM
Walk begins at 9:00 AM
Race begins at 10:00 AM
Kid's Fun Run begins at the conclusion of the 5K Race
Post Race Party begins at 12:00 PM

Place:
Scituate Beach Association Ball Field
Corner of Otis Rd and Turner Rd
Scituate, MA 02066

Entry Fee:
Runners: $25 Day of $30
Walkers: $20 Day of $25
* Please note: All checks must be mailed by 8/16/10


ON LINE REGISTRATION AND REGISTRATION FORM BOTH AVAILABLE AT THIS LINK:
http://www.coolrunnin...

Make checks payable to:
Scituate Beach Association

Mail entry form to:
Tim Brodigan
44 Flett Road
Belmont MA 02478


Course: The Route features approximately 2 miles of ocean front running/walking
Amenities: Trophies, Prizes, Kidsâ€™ Games, Refreshments, First 300 Pre-registered Get a Free T-Shirt!

Even if you are still in training, this will be a nice way to judge your own progress. And there is nothing wrong with walking part of it. Runners are only against themselves and go at their own pace!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Red Sox hat and have my hair in a pony tail. Please try to have a picture posted if I haven't met you yet.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: 3rd Annual Scituate Beach Association 5K Road Race/Walk
